page.description: Methods and properties available for interacting with a List Control object.

property.name: suspendPersist
property.description: Used to temporary suspend persisting List data to Local Storage or the File System. Only applies to Lists with *[link:Persist data to Local Storage (or Filesystem)]* enabled. See *[link:listObj.addTableRow Method]* for additional information.

page.discussion: To get a list object, use the *[js:{dialog.object}.getControl]* method:
